title: Microlearning Based on Emergency Airway Management Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Simulation curriculum supporting smartphone-based learning for in-service practitioners in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply emergency airway assessment protocols with 80% accuracy within 5 minutes
Learners can use airway maintenance devices (oral airway, LMA, etc.) with 90% accuracy in a simulation environment
Learners can perform three consecutive successful airway management procedures in team-based scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
